text:
Здравейте,

Може ли да помогнете с това? Искат потвърждение на салда



---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: hristo.import <hristo.import@gmail.com <mailto:hristo.import@gmail.com> >
Date: Fri, 12 Apr 2024 at 10:40
Subject: FW: TIBIEL Eood - Wärtsilä Hungary Kft. - Balance confirmation - FY2023
To: @Nikolina Tabakova <toplo.tabakova@gmail.com <mailto:toplo.tabakova@gmail.com> >







Sent from my Galaxy


-------- Original message --------
From: "Zsolt Gyenge (HU)" <zsolt.gyenge@pwc.com <mailto:zsolt.gyenge@pwc.com> > 
Date: 12/04/2024 10:03 (GMT+02:00) 
To: hristo.import@gmail.com <mailto:hristo.import@gmail.com>  
Cc: "Szabolcs Bak (HU)" <szabolcs.bak@pwc.com <mailto:szabolcs.bak@pwc.com> > 
Subject: TIBIEL Eood - Wärtsilä Hungary Kft. - Balance confirmation - FY2023 

Dear Hristo Todorov,

I am contacting you on behalf of PricewaterhouseCoopers Auditing Ltd. with regards to the audit of our common client,  Wärtsilä Hungary Kft. As part of the normal audit procedures, we are asking you to confirm the amounts on the invoices listed in the attached file, as shown by Wärtsilä Hungary Kft.'s records, that were due as of 31 December 2023.

After comparing the balance with your records please complete and sign the enclosed confirmation and return it directly to PricewaterhouseCoopers Auditing Ltd. by email (reply all on this email).

 

Please return the attached confirmation letter even if you agree to the balance and even if the account has since been settled. If there are differences, please provide any information that will assist us in reconciling the differences.



Please note that this request is made for normal audit purposes only.


We appreciate your cooperation.


Best Regards,


Zsolt Gyenge

PwC | Assurance | Senior Associate

Mobile: +36 70 318 7952 | Email: zsolt.gyenge@pwc.com <mailto:zsolt.gyenge@pwc.com> 

Privacy Statement / Adatvédelem <https://www.pwc.com/hu/hu/rolunk/privacy.html> 


The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential and/or privileged material. Any review, retransmission, dissemination or other use of, or taking of any action in reliance upon, this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited. If you received this in error, please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer.  Please familiarize yourself with our privacy policy.
subject: Fwd: FW: TIBIEL Eood - Wärtsilä Hungary Kft. - Balance confirmation - FY2023
attachmentsData:
Customer's name: TIBIEL Eood
Contact: Hristo Todorov
Address: Trade Center "Evropa", 34 "3020" Str., 1360 Sofia, Bulgaria
Email: Hristo.import@gmail.com
Dear Madam/Sir,
As part of normal audit procedures, our auditors, PricewaterhouseCoopers Auditing Ltd.
request that you confirm the balance on your account with us as at 31 December 2023.
We enclose a statement of our account up to that date. We kindly ask you to complete and
sign the enclosed confirmation and return it directly to PricewaterhouseCoopers Auditing Ltd.
by email AND the original by regular mail to:
PricewaterhouseCoopers Auditing Ltd.
1055 Budapest, Bajcsy-Zsilinszky út 78.
1438 Budapest, P.O. Box 517.
Attn: Szabolcs Bak
Email: szabolcs.bak@pwc.com, zsolt.gyenge@pwc.com
Based on our records as at the date above, we present a receivable balance in our favour:
381,397.03 EUR receivables
-655,500.00 EUR advance payment
Please return the attached confirmation letter even if the balance above is correct and/or the
account has since been settled. If the balance is not in agreement with your records, please
add the details of your balance in your confirmation to our auditors (highlighting the items
making up the difference if identified).
Please note that this request is made for audit purposes only and does not affect the
remittances.
We appreciate your cooperation.
Yours faithfully,
Den Adel
Wärtsilä Hungary Kft.
